Package collection

Class Collection

  • java.lang.Object
    • collection.Collection
  • public class Collection
extends java.lang.Object
    The collection class used as the foundation of the program. This class contains methods to perform several functions to the collection of albums.
    Author:
    Tommy Cho, Neha Gudur

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Album[] albums  
      private int numAlbums

      Collection()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean add​(Album album)
      Adds an album to the collection.
      private int find​(Album album)
      Finds the index of a certain album within the collection.
      int getNumAlbums()
      Gets the number of albums in the collection.
      private void grow()
      Increases the size of the album list by 4.
      int isFound​(Album album)
      helper method that determines if an album is in the collection or not
      boolean lendingOut​(Album album)
      Sets the availability of an album to unavailable.
      void print()
      Prints the collection of albums in no specific order.
      void printByGenre()
      Prints the collection of albums in order of genre.
      void printByReleaseDate()
      Prints the collection of albums in order of release date.

        public Collection()

    • Method Detail

      • getNumAlbums

        public int getNumAlbums()
        Gets the number of albums in the collection.
        Returns:
        integer value of the quantity of albums.

      • find

        private int find​(Album album)
        Finds the index of a certain album within the collection. Return -1 if no match
        Parameters:
        album - album that the method is attempting to find the index for
        Returns:
        the index of the target album.

      • grow

        private void grow()
        Increases the size of the album list by 4. Use whenever the album list fills up to max capacity so we never have a completely full list.

      • add

        public boolean add​(Album album)
        Adds an album to the collection.
        Parameters:
        album - album that is being added
        Returns:
        true if the album was successfully added and false otherwise.

      • remove

        public boolean remove​(Album album)
        Removes an album from the collection.
        Parameters:
        album - album that is being removed
        Returns:
        true if the album was successfully removed and false otherwise.

      • lendingOut

        public boolean lendingOut​(Album album)
        Sets the availability of an album to unavailable.
        Parameters:
        album - album whose availability is being set
        Returns:
        true if the album was lent and false otherwise.

      • returnAlbum

        public boolean returnAlbum​(Album album)
        Sets the availability of an album to available.
        Parameters:
        album - album whose availability is being set
        Returns:
        true if the album was returned and false otherwise.

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints the collection of albums in no specific order.

      • printByReleaseDate

        public void printByReleaseDate()
        Prints the collection of albums in order of release date.

      • printByGenre

        public void printByGenre()
        Prints the collection of albums in order of genre.

      • isFound

        public int isFound​(Album album)
        helper method that determines if an album is in the collection or not
        Parameters:
        album - album that is being looked for
        Returns:
        index of found album if album is found and -1 if it is not in the collection
